extendedInfo.description: Scissor Art Cutting is an artform created using paper cutting. The Paper is folded mamy times and then cut. When unfolded it form a beautiful symmetrical shape. We have here a Live Wallpaper cutting in 3D cube of these paper art. We added Lighting and particle effects to enhance the visual elements. List of feature include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.
